articles.author: Megan Messerly, Ari Hawkins, Daniel Desrochers, Phelim Kine
articles.title: ‘Throw of the iron dice’: Inside Trump’s most perilous foreign trip yet - Politico
articles.description: A week-long swing through Asia could cement Trump’s image as master dealmaker — or trigger the economic crisis he’s long vowed to prevent.
articles.content: This is one of the riskiest trips any president of the United States has taken, said Steve Bannon, Trumps former White House chief strategist. The Chinese Communist Party has declared open economic w… [+8990 chars]
